markdownRemark.html:
A very sad reflection on the events surrounding the therapeutics for what legacy institutions and legacy media labelled as SARS-CoV-2. Though chaos is at play, maligned incentives and capital allocation aligning with macro wants of legacy capital holders is nudging the chaos.

A repeated message force fed,
Safe and effective they all said,
Armies paid to make masses scared,
Statesmen indifferent to the dead,
Brainwashing push leaving lines crossed,
Now all trust in the state is lost,
Better than nature when man-made,
Lobyists surely earned their pay,

safe and effective,
( means of control )

Now global warming causes strokes,
Another healthy adult croaks,
Tears shed for the anxiety stoked,
Nations devolved into a joke,
Do your bit for the greater good,
Commies are just misunderstood,
We have no voice, but we pretend,
Wake us up when this clown world ends,

safe and effective,
( means of control )

You must help to prevent the spread,
Forget about health, take these meds,
Ill-trust seeded will not just fade,
Adverse effects, page after page,
Against the people war is waged,
All's fake and the world's a stage,
We all know the end to this play,
It's left to us to turn the page,

safe and effective,
( means of control )

Trust the science, echoes a voice,
Your body but you have no choice,
Doctors callously forget vows,
Before the altar patients bow,
Fact checked in real-time as you speak,
Newsprint fear-porn for us to eat,
Only cite approved sources, please,
No-one said that freedom is free,

safe and effective,
( means of control )
markdownRemark.excerpt: A very sad reflection on the events surrounding the therapeutics for what legacy institutions and legacy media labelled as SARS-CoV-2. Though chaos is at play, maligned incentives and capital allocation aligning with macro wants of legacy capitalâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Safe and Effective ( Ode to the 77th Brigade )
frontmatter.tags: vaccines covid SADS medical-fraud SARS-CoV-2 poem poetry NHS 77thBrigade brainwashing
